thumb.title: Voltes V no Uta (ボルテスVの歌) / cover by Himena Nome Japan VTuber idol #voltesv #voltesvlegacy #ボルテスV
thumb.description: ━━━━━━━━━🎀 FOLLOW ME 🎀━━━━━━━━━Here's the link to my web➪ https://himenanome.com/━━━━━━━━🎀 ORIGINAL 🎀━━━━━━━━I do not own this song. I just want to share my love of music through singing. Let's all support the original creators: ▸ Song: Voltes V no Uta / ボルテスVの歌 / ボルテスVのうた▸ OST: Choudenji Machine Voltes V / 超電磁マシーン ボルテスＶ OP▸ Original Performers: Mitsuko Horie / 堀江 美都子, Koorogi '73 / こおろぎ'73, Columbia Yurikago-kai / コロムビアゆりかご会▸ Composition: Asei Kobayashi / 小林 亜星▸ Lyrics: Saburo Yatsude /八手 三郎▸ Arrangement: Hiroshi Takada / 高田 弘｡.:*･ﾟ＋.｡.:*･ﾟ＋.｡.:*･ﾟ＋.｡.:*･ﾟ＋.｡.:*･ﾟ＋.｡.:*･ﾟ＋.｡.:*･ﾟ＋.｡.:*･ﾟ＋
thumb.last_res_body: 天空剣！ ニコニコにも投稿...
